original_text: I tell you this: Because you do not believe in me, God will take his kingdom away from you. He will give it to people who show that they obey him.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 너희에게 이르노니 하나님의 나라를 너희는 빼앗기고 그 나라의 열매 맺는 백성이 받으리라

sentences.original_text: Because you do not believe in me,
God will take his kingdom away from you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그의 나라를 너희에게서 빼앗아 가실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: to people who show that they obey him.
